Home.block-1-content-1: Tasty fresh food delivered to your door
Home.block-1-content-2: Meals customised to your Dog<apos10></apos10>s specific nutritional needs
Home.block-1-content-4: Easier for you, better for them!
Home.block-2-content: Trade guesswork for peace of mind. Relax, knowing that your dog is getting the highest quality nutrition for a longer and more vibrant life! <maxtbr></maxtbr>It<apos10></apos10>s science...and it<apos10></apos10>s delicious.
Home.block-3-title: More Years, <block>Happier Years.</block> <block>It<apos14></apos14>s Time To Go Fresh.</block>
Home.block-4-item-1-content: Fresh, human-grade ingredients cooked slowly to maintain nutritional integrity and maximise flavour. Crafted with minimal processing and maximum safety in mind – it<apos10></apos10>s food even you could eat.
Home.block-4-item-2-content: Each pre-made, pre-portioned meal is aligned with your pet<apos14></apos14>s unique health goals, right down to the last calorie, as determined by the profile you create.
Home.block-4-item-3-content: From our kitchen to your fridge in days <nowrap>— that<apos14></apos14>s</nowrap> how fresh we like it. We oversee every facet of production to make sure only the best lands in your dog<apos10></apos10>s bowl.
Home.block-5-item-1-content: Take our quick quiz to help us understand your furry friend. Based on their preferences and needs, We<apos04></apos04>ll formulate a personalised meal plan just for them.
Home.block-5-item-2-content: To get you started, we<apos04></apos04>ll send you two weeks<apos14></apos14> worth of freshly crafted meals. It<apos10></apos10>s the ideal intro for your dog<apos10></apos10>s discerning palate!
Home.block-5-item-3-content: If our meals win your hearts, sit back and relax. Your Dog<apos10></apos10>s food will arrive at your door like clockwork. If you need to make changes, simply adjust your subscription at any time.
Home.block-5-content: Not ready for a subscription? No problem! Try our individual packs first.
Home.block-6-content: Choose OCELLE and watch your dog thrive – from better gut health (cleaner poops!) and luxurious fur, to optimised energy for life. But you don<apos04></apos04>t have to take our word for it:
Home.muffin-content: An active 9-year-old Poodle with allergies who<apos14></apos14>s on a weight loss journey. She needs flavourful food without excess calories that are easy to digest. Her Fresh Duck plan ensures:
Home.pixie-content: A mellow 10-year-old Bichon Friese, who<apos14></apos14>s a picky eater and needs nutrients that support her physical health with the flavours she loves. Her Fresh Beef plan ensures:
Home.toast-content: A very active 6-year-old Pug with severe allergies, who needs nutrient-rich food to fuel his active lifestyle, while being easy on his stomach. His Fresh Pork plan ensures:
Home.block-7-content: Get fresh food conveniently delivered with our <block>customised meal plans.</block>

Recipes.block-1-content-1: Crafted to human-grade standards, our recipes are skilfully balanced for total nutrition. We use quality proteins and vegetables, combined with targeted vitamins and minerals to nourish your dog at every stage of life.
Recipes.block-1-content-2: No heat-blasted ingredients. No preservatives. No fillers. No nonsense. Just wholesome food thats as appetizing as it looks.
Recipes.our-{}-for-dogs-is-formulated-to-meet-th: Our {name} for Dogs is formulated to meet the nutritional levels established by the AAFCO Dog Food Nutrient Profiles for all life stages, including growth of large sized dogs (70 lbs. or more as an adult).
Recipes.chicken:description: A gentle yet satisfying combination for dogs with sensitive stomachs. The perfect blend of lean protein, whole grains, and antioxidant-rich superfoods for health, energy, and a shiny coat.
Recipes.beef:description: This hearty meal delivers high-quality beef for strength, a rainbow of veggies for antioxidant power, and superfoods to boost immunity. Hit the ground running with every bowl!
Recipes.lamb:description: A flavour and nutrient powerhouse, capable of satisfying even the pickiest of eaters. Crafted for muscle strength, immune support, radiant health, and a shiny coat!
Recipes.duck:description: A wholesome feast, tailored for digestive health, luxurious coats, and improved vitality! Perfect for dogs seeking a unique and hypoallergenic dining experience without compromising on taste and health.
Recipes.pork:description: Embrace gentle nutrition with this hypoallergenic feast. It combines novel proteins with leafy greens for digestive ease, immune strength, and a coat that shines. Perfect for dogs with sensitive stomachs or allergies!
Recipes.block-7-title: The Main Benefits Of Feeding With OCELLE<apos14></apos14>s Fresh Recipes:
Recipes.block-7-title-1: Feeding Fresh Is Shown to Increase Lifespan & Delay Onset of Chronic Disease
Recipes.block-7-content-1: Dogs fed a homemade diet (like our recipes) lived up to 3 years longer than those on traditional processed diets. Even a slight 25% reduction in processed food intake showed beneficial impact.
Recipes.block-7-title-2: Meals Portioned to the Exact Calorie Reduces the Likelihood of Obesity
Recipes.block-7-content-2: Overweight dogs have reduced lifespans of up to 2.5 years and showed an increased probability of developing chronic diseases. While food bag guidelines offer a starting point to portion sizes, every dog is an individual with unique needs. That<apos14></apos14>s why we<apos14></apos14>ve worked closely with our Veterinarian to develop a formula that determines the optimal calorie needs for different combinations of breed, age, activity level, and ideal weight.
Recipes.block-7-title-3: Quality Matters: Immune Support, Improve Digestion, Healthier Skin, Shiner Coats, and Lasting Energy
Recipes.block-7-content-3: Our gently cooked recipes are made with fresh, wholesome ingredients. Our minimally processed approach unlocks the natural power of these nutrients making them more easily absorbed, so your dog can reap the full benefits. Packed with natural goodness, our fresh food menus fuel their well-being, vitality, and quality of life.
Recipes.block-7-content-4: Kibble or canned foods are routinely found to contain ingredients not listed on the label, so it can be hard to be sure what<apos14></apos14>s going into your Dog<apos10></apos10>s bowl. Our not so secret recipes are 100% transparent and built with limited, but powerful ingredients – allowing for confident allergy control.
Recipes.block-7-content-5: Fresh food focuses on using whole, unprocessed ingredients like meat, vegetables, and fruits. These ingredients better retain their natural flavours and textures, enticing even the pickiest of eaters, making mealtimes more exciting for your dog.
Recipes.block-7-content-6: More excitement at mealtimes; smaller firmer stools (better poops!); soft and shiny coats; more energy; increased stamina…and much, much more!
Recipes.block-8-title: Freshen Up With A Science First Approach To Pet Food
Recipes.block-8-content: Get fresh food conveniently delivered with our customised meal plans.

Ingredients.chicken-brest-description: A lean source of high-quality protein, essential for muscle growth and repair. It also supplies glucosamine and chondroitin, the building blocks of joint cartilage, tendons, and ligaments.
Ingredients.chicken-liver-description: A nutrient powerhouse, packed with iron for healthy blood, vitamin A for sharp vision, B vitamins for energy metabolism, and choline for healthy brain function.
Ingredients.whole-grain-rice-description: A wholesome source of complex carbohydrates, whole-grain rice provides dogs with sustained energy. It<apos10></apos10>s also gentle on the digestive system, making it a good choice for dogs with sensitive stomachs.
Ingredients.shiitake-mushroom-description: Shiitake mushrooms are known for their immune-boosting properties and are also a good source of B vitamins.
Ingredients.spinach-description: Spinach is packed with vitamins A, C, and K, and are also a good source of iron and antioxidants. It supports immune health and provides anti-inflammatory benefits.
Ingredients.peas-description: Peas are low in calories and are a great source of plant-based protein and fibre, which can aid in digestion and nutrient absorption. They also contain essential vitamins and minerals like vitamin K, manganese, and folate.
Ingredients.cranberry-description: Rich in antioxidants, cranberries can help support urinary tract health and may prevent urinary infections. They are also beneficial for dental health.
Ingredients.flaxseed-description: Flaxseeds are an excellent source of essential fatty acids and fibre, promoting better skin, glossy coats, healthier brains, stronger hearts, pain-free joints, reduced inflammation, and improved digestion.
Ingredients.salmon-oil-description: High in omega-3 fatty acids, salmon oil helps in reducing inflammation, supporting joint health, and maintaining a healthy, shiny coat.
Ingredients.ocelle-targeted-nutrient-blend-descripti: Each recipe contains a specific formulation of vitamins and minerals, designed to synergize with our carefully chosen ingredients, ensuring that meals are packed with the life-stage-specific nutrients needed to thrive.
Ingredients.beef-chuck-description: Lean beef chuck is an excellent source of high-quality protein, crucial for muscle maintenance and overall body functions. It<apos10></apos10>s also rich in minerals and essential nutrients, like iron and zinc, which are important for healthier immune systems, stronger bones, and wound healing.
Ingredients.beef-liver-description: Beef liver is extremely nutrient-dense, offering a rich source of vitamin A for eye health, iron for healthy blood cells, and B vitamins for energy production.
Ingredients.carrot-description: Carrots are high in beta-carotene, which converts to vitamin A and supports vision health. They<apos14></apos14>re also a good source of fibre, aiding in digestive health, and have antioxidants for immune support.
Ingredients.kale-description: This leafy green is packed with vitamins A, C, and K, along with antioxidants and iron. It supports immune health, vision, and overall wellness.
Ingredients.potato-description: Potatoes are a good source of carbohydrates, potassium, and vitamins C and B6. They provide energy and are easily digestible, making them suitable for sensitive stomachs.
Ingredients.blueberry-description: Blueberries are superfoods for dogs, rich in antioxidants, vitamins C and K, and fibre. They support urinary tract health and can contribute to overall cellular health and cognitive function.
Ingredients.pork-loin-description: Pork is lean and a novel protein for most dogs, providing high-quality nutrients for muscle development and overall body function. It<apos10></apos10>s also a good source of B vitamins, particularly B1 (rhiamine), which is crucial for carbohydrate metabolism.
Ingredients.pork-liver-description: Pork liver is nutrient rich, offering high levels of iron and vitamins A and B. These nutrients are key for maintaining healthy vision, blood health, and energy levels.
Ingredients.celery-description: Celery is a beneficial leafy green, offering vitamins A and C, iron, and antioxidants. It supports immune health, digestive wellness, and provides anti-inflammatory benefits.
Ingredients.lamb-leg-description: Lamb is a highly palatable meat and an excellent source of quality protein and essential fats, which help with energy levels, proper growth, and overall health. It<apos10></apos10>s also a good source of iron and zinc, which are crucial for immune function and skin health.
Ingredients.duck-breast-description: Duck is lean and packed with essential amino acids, vitamins, and antioxidants to promote good health. It<apos10></apos10>s also a novel protein for many dogs, making it suitable for those with sensitivities or allergies.
Ingredients.winter-melon-description: Winter melon is very low in calories and high in fibre, aiding in digestion. It<apos10></apos10>s also hydrating and can be beneficial for dogs with kidney issues or those needing a low-fat diet.
Ingredients.goji-berry-description: Goji berries are known for their high antioxidant content, supporting immune health, vision, and overall cellular function.
Ingredients.whole-grain-pasta-description: A source of complex carbohydrates, whole grain pasta provides sustained energy. It is also a good source of fibre, which aids in digestion, and B vitamins for energy metabolism.
Ingredients.lamb-leg-boneless-description: Lamb is a highly palatable meat and an excellent source of quality protein and essential fats, which help with energy levels, proper growth, and overall health. It<apos10></apos10>s also a good source of iron and zinc, which are crucial for immune function and skin health.

IndividualPack.block-8-title: Your Dog Deserves A Fresh Start
IndividualPack.block-8-content-1: Many of the health issues dogs face are related to diet. That<apos14></apos14>s why our team is devoted to determining exactly what dogs need to live happier, healthier lives.
IndividualPack.block-8-content-2: No heat-blasted ingredients. No preservatives. No fillers. No nonsense. Just real ingredients you can see, nutrition dogs need, and the flavours they crave.
IndividualPack.block-8-title-3: Freshly Made To Lock In Nutrients
IndividualPack.block-8-content-3: Our ingredients are gently cooked to maximize digestibility and preserve vital nutrients, texture, and taste.

WhyFresh.challenges-with-home-cooking-for-your-do: Challenges With Home <block>Cooking For Your Dog</block>
WhyFresh.block-1-content-1: Click <button>here</button> for our reference list, or below to learn more about pet food.

WhyFresh-BenefitsOfFreshDogFood.block-1-title:
A Good Diet Is The Key To Good Health.

Dogs Are No Different.
WhyFresh-BenefitsOfFreshDogFood.block-1-content-1:
We all know why we should be eating fresh food, but what about our dogs?

Just like us – dogs thrive on nutritious, whole foods.
WhyFresh-BenefitsOfFreshDogFood.block-2-content-1: Fresh food diets focus on the integrity, quality, and transparency of ingredients used. Its the same quality and type of food youd happily eat, just tailored to the nutritional needs of your dog.
WhyFresh-BenefitsOfFreshDogFood.block-2-content-2: Free from empty fillers, additives, and preservatives; OCELLE<apos14></apos14>s freshly prepared food uses quality whole foods like meat, vegetables, and fruits, gently cooked together to preserve nutritional integrity – optimised for health and flavour.
WhyFresh-BenefitsOfFreshDogFood.block-3-quota: <baskerville>“</baskerville>Pet food is highly processed, resulting in hidden and questionable ingredients.<baskerville>”</baskerville>
WhyFresh-BenefitsOfFreshDogFood.block-3-content-1: Kibble is ultra-processed ‘food’. It<apos10></apos10>s typically produced using high heat pressure—stripping away many of the natural nutrients and benefits contained in the ingredients—amongst a myriad of other potential concerns.<sup>1-5</sup>
WhyFresh-BenefitsOfFreshDogFood.block-4-content-1: If you<apos14></apos14>re considering to switch to a scientifically formulated, freshly prepared diet for your dog, Veterinary research suggests it<apos10></apos10>s a positive move. Here are some of the benefits...
WhyFresh-BenefitsOfFreshDogFood.block-4-benefits-1-title: Improved Digestion, More Energy…<block>& Better Poops!</block>
WhyFresh-BenefitsOfFreshDogFood.block-4-benefits-1-content-1: One of the main benefits of a fresh food diet is improved digestion. Several peer-reviewed studies have shown that fresh, lightly cooked food is more digestible compared to over-processed diets.<sup>6-9</sup>
WhyFresh-BenefitsOfFreshDogFood.block-4-benefits-1-content-2: This allows your dog to absorb more nutrients and reap the full benefits. Unlike fleeting energy spikes followed by an energy ‘crash’, fresh diets offer a steady release of energy throughout the day. It also means they produce smaller, firmer poops.<sup>9</sup>
WhyFresh-BenefitsOfFreshDogFood.block-4-benefits-1-content-3: The result? A more vibrant dog, ready to join you for longer walks, more adventurous hikes, and extended play sessions in the park.
WhyFresh-BenefitsOfFreshDogFood.block-4-benefits-1-content-4: Essentially, eating our fresh food can lead to:
WhyFresh-BenefitsOfFreshDogFood.block-4-benefits-1-content-4-mark-1: Better utilization of protein, vitamins, minerals, antioxidants, and other essential nutrients.
WhyFresh-BenefitsOfFreshDogFood.block-4-benefits-1-content-4-mark-2: Reduced digestive issues like gas, bloating, and diarrhoea.
WhyFresh-BenefitsOfFreshDogFood.block-4-benefits-1-content-4-mark-3: Smaller, less odorous stools and better poops!
WhyFresh-BenefitsOfFreshDogFood.block-4-benefits-2-content-1: Fresh food diets offer a powerful combination of safety and nutrition for your dog. The gentle cooking process ensures the food is free of harmful bacteria, while preserving essential nutrients that can help keep your Dog<apos10></apos10>s immune system strong.<sup>10, 11</sup>
WhyFresh-BenefitsOfFreshDogFood.block-4-benefits-2-content-2: These diets are packed with fresh vegetables brimming with vitamins A and C, prebiotics for gut-bio health, freshly cooked meats rich in zinc, and omega-rich fish oils – all designed to support your Dog<apos10></apos10>s natural well-being. Research has also shown that fresh foods can help lower the risk of developing certain cancers.<sup>12</sup>
WhyFresh-BenefitsOfFreshDogFood.block-4-benefits-2-content-3: This may help your dog feel better every day and it also might mean fewer trips to the Vet.
WhyFresh-BenefitsOfFreshDogFood.block-4-benefits-2-content-4: Fresh food diets can also be a game-changer for dogs with allergies, skin problems, or sensitive stomachs, as they<apos14></apos14>re free of artificial additives that can trigger these conditions. Many dogs experience relief after switching to a fresh food diet.
WhyFresh-BenefitsOfFreshDogFood.block-4-benefits-3-content-1: Fresh food goes beyond filling bellies – it<apos10></apos10>s packed with ingredients like fish oil and flaxseed, bursting with omega-3 and omega-6 fatty acids. These essential fats are like a built-in moisturizer, keeping skin hydrated and cells healthy, resulting in a coat that shines.<sup>13</sup>
WhyFresh-BenefitsOfFreshDogFood.block-4-benefits-3-content-2: Compared to processed foods, fresh ingredients are a natural multivitamin, brimming with a variety of vitamins and minerals. Vitamins A, E, B-complex, and zinc, all work together with omega fatty acids to help repair skin, shield it from environmental damage, and promote healthy hair growth for a truly radiant coat.
WhyFresh-BenefitsOfFreshDogFood.block-4-benefits-4-content-1: Many Vets suspect processed pet foods may trigger allergies and skin conditions in dogs. The good news?  Dietary changes offer a natural and straightforward way to address and better manage many of these issues.
WhyFresh-BenefitsOfFreshDogFood.block-4-benefits-4-content-2: Common culprits in pet food include certain grains, proteins, fillers, and artificial additives. Kibble and canned food often <button>lack ingredient transparency</button>,<sup>14-18</sup> making it hard to pinpoint what<apos14></apos14>s irritating your Dog<apos10></apos10>s skin.
WhyFresh-BenefitsOfFreshDogFood.block-4-benefits-4-content-3: Fresh food diets, built with limited but powerful, high-quality ingredients, provide much-needed clarity. It<apos10></apos10>s easier to identify and avoid allergens in a fresh food plan, leading to healthier skin, and less itching and scratching.
WhyFresh-BenefitsOfFreshDogFood.block-4-benefits-5-content-1: An ideal weight is not just about numbers on a scale; its a cornerstone of a healthier, happier life for your dog. In fact, research shows that maintaining a lean body weight can increase lifespan by up to 2.5 years.19
WhyFresh-BenefitsOfFreshDogFood.block-4-benefits-5-content-2: However, the challenge of carrying excess weight remains a leading health problem globally, with over half of all dogs being overweight or obese.20 For a dog, being overweight comes with significant health consequences, e.g., higher risk of joint problems, heart and lung diseases, and even cancer. Conversely, underweight dogs face their own set of health challenges, from weakened immunity, heart disease, and delayed wound healing.
WhyFresh-BenefitsOfFreshDogFood.block-4-benefits-5-content-3: Precise Portions Are Key: The key to healthy weight lies in accurate portion control. Generic food guidelines can only do so much, as every dog has unique dietary needs. Relying solely on dry-food measuring cups has been shown to lead to significant portioning errors, with one study even finding participants incorrectly portioning food by up to 47% underestimation and up to 152% overestimation.21 To avoid this guessing game, you need to know how many calories your dog requires each day.
WhyFresh-BenefitsOfFreshDogFood.block-4-benefits-5-content-4: Digestibility & Food Quality: As you adjust your Dogs food intake, quality matters. Fresh, whole foods are highly digestible and nutrient rich,6-9 ensuring your dog can utilize the necessary vitamins, minerals, and nutrients without unnecessary calories from fillers. This can promote a healthy metabolism and aid in weight management.
WhyFresh-BenefitsOfFreshDogFood.block-4-benefits-5-content-5: Satisfied Without Excess Calories: Compared to kibble, fresh food typically offers higher protein, fewer refined carbohydrates, and empty fillers – helping dogs feel ‘full’ for longer. This natural satiety, combined with higher food volumes due to production methods, reduces the likelihood of overeating to support a healthy weight.
WhyFresh-BenefitsOfFreshDogFood.block-4-benefits-5-content-6: The Path to Perfect Weight: Attaining your Dogs ideal weight is a marathon, not a sprint – consistency and patience are key. Fresh food plans like OCELLEs simplify the process by building customised plans according to your Dogs unique profile.
WhyFresh-BenefitsOfFreshDogFood.block-4-benefits-5-content-7: Information like ideal weight, age, body condition, breed, spay / neuter status, activity level, and more are factored in to take the guesswork out of portioning. Crafted by Vets to be highly digestible, nutritionally balanced, and complete; it<apos10></apos10>s never been easier to give your dog the appropriate amount of nourishment they actually need.
WhyFresh-BenefitsOfFreshDogFood.block-4-benefits-6-content-1: Picky eaters can present a challenge, but fresh food offers a natural and appealing solution.
WhyFresh-BenefitsOfFreshDogFood.block-4-benefits-6-content-2: Unlike kibble, which may rely on artificial additives for flavour and suffers from a lack of textural variety – it<apos10></apos10>s not all about the crunch! Fresh meals offer rich aromas, diverse natural flavours, and varied food textures to keep mealtimes exciting. As an added bonus, fresh ingredients naturally contain more water than dry dog food, which helps to keep them better hydrated throughout the day.
WhyFresh-BenefitsOfFreshDogFood.block-4-benefits-6-content-3: For those navigating the preferences of a picky eater, introducing a variety of OCELLE<apos14></apos14>s recipes will keep your Dog<apos10></apos10>s diet both exciting and nutritionally rich, meaning your ‘picky-eating’ dog will look forward to every meal.
WhyFresh-BenefitsOfFreshDogFood.block-4-benefits-7-title: Fresh Diets May Help Increase Your Dog<apos10></apos10>s Lifespan
WhyFresh-BenefitsOfFreshDogFood.block-4-benefits-7-content-1: Research underscores the profound impact of diet on lifespan. One long-term study found that dogs nourished with fresh, balanced, homemade diets (similar to OCELLE<apos14></apos14>s food) lived for about 3 years longer than those on commercial, processed diets.<sup>22</sup>
WhyFresh-BenefitsOfFreshDogFood.block-4-benefits-7-content-2: Put simply, a fresh food diet could help you and your dog enjoy more years filled with joyful barks, belly rubs, and wagging tails!
WhyFresh-BenefitsOfFreshDogFood.block-4-benefits-8-content-1: Enjoying good food is one of life's pleasures, both for us and our dogs. Among all the benefits of fresh food, perhaps the greatest is the joy of watching our Dog<apos10></apos10>s excitement, every time we put real food in their bowl. There<apos14></apos14>s no better feeling than knowing with every bite, they<apos14></apos14>re getting something you know is healthy and delicious for them.

WhyFresh-RawVsGentlyCookedDiets.block-2-content-1: Dog owners considering fresh food diets have two main choices: raw or cooked.
WhyFresh-RawVsGentlyCookedDiets.block-2-content-2: Proponents of raw diets believe it mimics what a Dog<apos10></apos10>s wild ancestors ate. However, despite the resemblance to their wild ancestors, dogs have adapted to a more omnivorous diet and a domesticated lifestyle that doesn<apos14></apos14>t leave them as equipped to handle rough objects (bones / bone splinters) or potentially dangerous bacteria found in a purely raw diet.
WhyFresh-RawVsGentlyCookedDiets.block-2-content-3: In fact, most Veterinarians and Governing bodies (e.g., FDA) discourage the feeding of raw diets, due to potential nutritional imbalances and contamination risks.<sup>1-12</sup>
WhyFresh-RawVsGentlyCookedDiets.block-2-quota: <baskerville>“</baskerville>There are also no clinically proven benefits of a raw food diet, but there are documented hazards and risks.<baskerville>”</baskerville>
WhyFresh-RawVsGentlyCookedDiets.block-2-quota-person:
- Malcolm Weir (DVM, MSc, MPH) &

Robin Downing (DVM, CVPP, CCRP, DAAPM)
WhyFresh-RawVsGentlyCookedDiets.block-3-content-1: Even some commercially-prepared raw dog foods have been found to contain high levels of germs / bacteria (like salmonella and E. coli), with some even failing to meet safe thresholds.<sup>13-17</sup> This poses a real risk to both owners and pets alike.
WhyFresh-RawVsGentlyCookedDiets.block-4-title: Advantages Of Fresh, Gently Cooked Diets:
WhyFresh-RawVsGentlyCookedDiets.block-4-content-1: The slow-cooking process can make the food easier for your dog to digest and safer for both you and your dog to handle.
WhyFresh-RawVsGentlyCookedDiets.block-4-content-2: While dogs need to get most of their protein from meat, many raw diets are 90% meat; diets this high in meat are often also high in fat, which can lead to digestive problems.
WhyFresh-RawVsGentlyCookedDiets.block-4-content-3: Cooked diets typically incorporate more vegetables, providing essential fibre, vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants that support a healthy immune system. Studies even suggest they may lower the risk of certain cancers.<sup>18</sup>
WhyFresh-RawVsGentlyCookedDiets.block-5-content-1: Ultimately, the choice between raw and cooked fresh food depends on your individual Dog<apos10></apos10>s needs and your comfort level in giving them raw meat. If you decide to go raw, proceed with caution and ensure the diet is <block>nutritionally balanced.</block>
WhyFresh-RawVsGentlyCookedDiets.block-6-title:
Freshen Up With A Science First

Approach To Pet Food
WhyFresh-RawVsGentlyCookedDiets.block-6-content-1: Get fresh food conveniently delivered with our customised meal plans.

WhyFresh-Challenges.block-1-title:
Challenges With Home Cooking

For Your Dog
WhyFresh-Challenges.block-2-content-1: We can all agree, there is nothing better than a home-cooked meal!
WhyFresh-Challenges.block-2-content-2: Without professional guidance, however, even the most well-intentioned diets can fall short. Research has found that up to 95% of home-prepared diets lack vital nutrients, endangering long-term health <block>due to nutrient deficiency.</block><sup>1, 2</sup>
WhyFresh-Challenges.block-3-mark-1-content: Muscle wasting, poor athletic performance, muscle atrophy, and in severe cases, heart failure.
WhyFresh-Challenges.block-3-mark-2-content: Poor skin and coat health, possibly different responses to overcome inflammation issues.
WhyFresh-Challenges.block-3-mark-3-content: Musculoskeletal problems, liver dysfunction, heart disease, poor skin or coat condition.
WhyFresh-Challenges.block-3-mark-4-content: To accurately determine the correct calorific content for a home-prepared meal can be a challenge; principally, the issue is about proper portion sizes to prevent under- and / or over-feeding, which can leave pets hungry or <button>overweight</button>.
WhyFresh-Challenges.block-3-mark-5-content: Vitamins and other supplements can help round-out home-prepared meals. Although, your Dog<apos10></apos10>s needs will vary depending on the recipe<apos14></apos14>s ingredients, preparation method, and any existing health conditions.
WhyFresh-Challenges.block-4-content-1: Home-prepared meals allow some flexibility regarding contents and preparation, which is why it is important to consult your Vet to ensure your home-prepared meals meet the correct nutritional and dietary requirements.
WhyFresh-Challenges.block-4-content-2: Of course, feeding your dog fresh, home-made food is wonderful – that<apos14></apos14>s why we do it <block>with our Vet-approved meals!</block>
WhyFresh-Challenges.block-5-content-1: Get fresh food conveniently delivered with our customised meal plans.

WhyFresh-ItsTimeToRethinkKibble.block-1-content-1:
Somewhere along the way, a daily scoop of

kibble became the norm for your dog. But is it enough?
WhyFresh-ItsTimeToRethinkKibble.block-2-mark-1-content: Nearly 60% of dogs are overweight globally.<sup>1</sup> Prevalence has increased, with certain areas up ~158% between 2007 and 2017.<sup>2</sup>
WhyFresh-ItsTimeToRethinkKibble.block-2-mark-2-content: Prevalence has increased, with certain areas up ~80% since 2006.<sup>3</sup>
WhyFresh-ItsTimeToRethinkKibble.block-2-mark-3-content: Over 80% of dogs will develop some form of dental disease in their lifetime.<sup>4</sup>
WhyFresh-ItsTimeToRethinkKibble.block-2-mark-4-content: Nearly half of all dogs over the age of 10 develop cancer.<sup>5</sup>
WhyFresh-ItsTimeToRethinkKibble.block-2-quota: <baskerville>“</baskerville>The chase for convenience…has resulted in continuous, repeat exposure to potentially harmful ingredients.<baskerville>”</baskerville>
WhyFresh-ItsTimeToRethinkKibble.block-3-content-1: It<apos10></apos10>s easy to see kibble as the simple choice for a dog. It<apos10></apos10>s nothing like what we eat, but it<apos10></apos10>s okay for them…or so we thought?!
WhyFresh-ItsTimeToRethinkKibble.block-4-mark-1-title: Diseased Meats, If Rendered At High Temperatures
WhyFresh-ItsTimeToRethinkKibble.block-4-mark-1-content-1: <h>Yes, certain carcasses or parts may be rejected from use for humans and processed into animal feed.</h>
WhyFresh-ItsTimeToRethinkKibble.block-4-mark-1-content-2: Meat and meat byproducts not directly suitable for animal food that are designated as <h>4-D (dead, dying, diseased or disabled). These are considered adulterated—unless processed in a manner that rids them of disease-causing microorganisms prior to becoming animal feed. This is most often done by rendering,</h> which subjects the materials to heat and pressure to eliminate harmful bacteria.
WhyFresh-ItsTimeToRethinkKibble.block-4-mark-2-content-1: <h>Rendered product from mammal tissues</h>, exclusive of any added blood, hair, hoof, horn, hide trimmings, manure, stomach and rumen contents <h>except in such amounts as may occur unavoidably in good processing practices.</h>
WhyFresh-ItsTimeToRethinkKibble.block-4-mark-2-content-2: Unlike meat and “meat by-products,” <h>this ingredient may be from mammals other than cattle, pigs, sheep or goats without further description.</h> However, a manufacturer may designate a species if appropriate (e.g., “beef meal” if only from cattle).
WhyFresh-ItsTimeToRethinkKibble.block-4-mark-3-title: 3% Is All You Need To Say ‘Made With’
WhyFresh-ItsTimeToRethinkKibble.block-4-mark-3-content-1: Including <h>the words “with”</h> or “similar” allows an ingredient to be included in the product name or anywhere else on the label at an <h>inclusion rate of at least 3% of each named ingredient.</h> “Honest Jack<apos14></apos14>s Dog Food With Chicken” should contain at least 3% chicken, while “Cynthia<apos14></apos14>s Super Cat Food with Tuna and Rice” should contain at least 3% tuna and 3% rice.
WhyFresh-ItsTimeToRethinkKibble.block-4-mark-4-content-1: Does AAFCO have any warnings or recommendations regarding products labeled natural, all-natural or 100% natural?
WhyFresh-ItsTimeToRethinkKibble.block-4-mark-4-content-2: Other than concerns for potential misbranding and misunderstanding amongst consumers, no.
WhyFresh-ItsTimeToRethinkKibble.block-4-mark-4-content-3: <h>Natural and like terms are not expressions of safety, but simply fit a loose definition.</h>
WhyFresh-ItsTimeToRethinkKibble.block-4-mark-4-content-5: <h>“Premium” is a totally unregulated term in feed law.</h> Whereas premium gasoline must meet higher octane standards than regular gasoline, <h>premium pet food doesn<apos14></apos14>t have special requirements that differ from any other pet food.</h>
WhyFresh-ItsTimeToRethinkKibble.block-4-mark-5-title:
Would You Eat Your Food

If It Came With Warning Signs Like This?
WhyFresh-ItsTimeToRethinkKibble.block-4-mark-5-content-1: <h>Always wash your hands with soap and water right after handling pet food or treats;</h> this is the most important step to prevent illness.
WhyFresh-ItsTimeToRethinkKibble.block-4-mark-5-content-2: When possible, <h>store pet food and treats away from where human food is stored or prepared</h> and away from reach of young children.
WhyFresh-ItsTimeToRethinkKibble.block-4-mark-5-content-3: Don<apos14></apos14>t use your pet<apos14></apos14>s feeding bowl to scoop food. Use a clean, dedicated scoop, spoon, or cup.
WhyFresh-ItsTimeToRethinkKibble.block-4-mark-5-content-4: Always follow any storage instructions on pet food bags or containers.
WhyFresh-ItsTimeToRethinkKibble.block-5-mark-1-content-1: What counts as a ‘meat’ source in dog food can vary and range in description, due to industry regulation and standard production methods.
WhyFresh-ItsTimeToRethinkKibble.block-5-mark-1-content-2: Whole, ground carcasses, unfit for human consumption may be used, including animals that are sick, diseased, or dying.
WhyFresh-ItsTimeToRethinkKibble.block-5-mark-1-content-3: Some products use unspecified meat by-products or ‘meat meals’, rather than whole, high-quality meat sources. While not inherently harmful, these by-products are often sourced from less desirable parts of animals, like connective tissue, beaks, or bones, and may contain a minimal amount of quality meat.
WhyFresh-ItsTimeToRethinkKibble.block-5-mark-2-content-1: Many kibble formulas contain a high percentage of carbohydrates, as it<apos10></apos10>s an essential binding agent in the production process. Unsurprisingly, today<apos14></apos14>s kibble is estimated to contain ~4 times<sup>10, 11</sup> the carbohydrate content historically found in the canine diet.
WhyFresh-ItsTimeToRethinkKibble.block-5-mark-2-content-2: Carbs can be beneficial for dogs and provide a practical source of energy and fibre, but excessive carbs simply act as a filler. Fillers are ingredients that provide little to no nutritional value to dogs and are primarily used to bulk-up food and reduce production costs. Common fillers include corn, wheat, soy, and cellulose.
WhyFresh-ItsTimeToRethinkKibble.block-5-mark-2-content-3: While not necessarily harmful, fillers can dilute the overall nutritional quality of food, making it harder to get all the essential nutrients needed for optimal health. Excessive use of fillers may also lead to digestive issues and contribute to health problems like obesity, high blood sugar, and food allergies.
WhyFresh-ItsTimeToRethinkKibble.block-5-mark-2-content-4: Grain-free kibble isn<apos10></apos10>t exempt from this issue either, as ‘grain-free’ doesn<apos14></apos14>t mean carbohydrate-free. Instead, other carbs like potatoes and legumes will be used in excessively large quantities to ensure the kibble ‘dough’ binds properly.
WhyFresh-ItsTimeToRethinkKibble.block-5-mark-3-content-1: Kibble is typically produced via extrusion, where ingredients are mixed and cooked under high heat pressure. Alongside this extrusion process, preservatives are introduced to extend shelf life, while artificial colours and flavour enhancers are often infused to maintain its appeal, ensuring that it remains palatable even after sitting on a shelf for long periods of time.
WhyFresh-ItsTimeToRethinkKibble.block-5-mark-3-content-2: The high heat extrusion method, while effective for mass production, has been shown to reduce protein quality, decrease palatability, destroy essential heat-sensitive vitamins, and even produce compounds known to be carcinogenic.<sup>12-14</sup>
WhyFresh-ItsTimeToRethinkKibble.block-5-mark-3-content-3: To counterbalance the natural nutrients lost during this process, manufacturers artificially add vitamins and minerals in order to meet basic nutritional standards. However, despite these artificial supplement replacements, nutrients in kibble are found to be less digestible and bioavailable compared to nutrients from natural food sources.<sup>15-17</sup>
WhyFresh-ItsTimeToRethinkKibble.block-5-mark-3-content-4: Put simply, less usable nutrition = fewer health benefits.
WhyFresh-ItsTimeToRethinkKibble.block-5-mark-4-content-1: There<apos14></apos14>s often a lack of transparency about ingredient sources, manufacturing processes, and quality control measures, making it difficult for consumers to make fully-informed choices.<sup>18,19</sup>
WhyFresh-ItsTimeToRethinkKibble.block-5-mark-4-content-2: Labels can also be misleading; for example – the difference between ‘chicken dog food’ and ‘dog food with chicken’. While both are advertised as a chicken dish, the latter only needs to contain 3% (AAFCO) or 4% (FEDIAF) chicken to legally make this claim.
WhyFresh-ItsTimeToRethinkKibble.block-5-mark-4-content-3: Additionally, numerous studies have found pet foods containing undisclosed ingredients or even missing those they claim to use.<sup>20-24</sup> In the worst cases, these issues pose a significant health risk to dogs – especially those with underlying health issues.
WhyFresh-ItsTimeToRethinkKibble.block-6-title: How Does Kibble Affect Your Dog?
WhyFresh-ItsTimeToRethinkKibble.block-6-content-1: While it<apos10></apos10>s irresponsible to say that kibble directly causes X, Y, and Z diseases, many ingredients in kibble have been linked to a range of health issues, with a growing body of research advocating for alternative diet options.
WhyFresh-ItsTimeToRethinkKibble.block-6-content-2: Not all kibble is created equal, and indeed, it serves a purpose in the diverse landscape of canine nutrition. There are commendable brands out there striving to elevate the standards of their products.
WhyFresh-ItsTimeToRethinkKibble.block-6-content-3: Recognizing this, we also firmly believe that every dog deserves nutrition that does more than just satisfy hunger. Just because it<apos10></apos10>s ‘always been that way’, doesn<apos14></apos14>t mean it should stay that way. Like any other member of the family, they deserve to be fed properly. That<apos14></apos14>s why we started OCELLE, to make fresh feeding as easy as possible.
WhyFresh-ItsTimeToRethinkKibble.block-7-content-1: The key to our Dog<apos10></apos10>s well-being is real food in their bowls, not just pictures of it on a bag <block>or a tin.</block>
WhyFresh-ItsTimeToRethinkKibble.block-7-content-2: After all, pet food should actually be – real food.

AboutUs.block-1-content-1: Term of endearment: ‘My little eye’, ‘my dearest’, ‘my precious one’, or ‘apple of my eye’. Used affectionately to address a loved one.
AboutUs.block-1-content-3: Treasured object or person: Something or someone held in high regard and considered valuable.
AboutUs.block-2-content-1: OCELLE wasn't born in a lab, but in a loving home.
AboutUs.block-2-content-2: Imagine the frustration of watching your beloved pet turn away from every meal. Our founder, Kevan, experienced this firsthand with his dog, Charlie – a notoriously picky eater. Despite countless attempts with commercial brands, Charlie's appetite remained a constant battle.
AboutUs.block-2-content-3: Determined to find a solution, Kevan consulted with his Vet and decided to try cooking homemade meals. After extensive research with insights from leading Vet Nutritionists, he crafted a scientifically formulated diet tailored to Charlie's needs.
AboutUs.block-2-content-4: The transformation was remarkable. Charlie, once lethargic and uninterested, began to thrive. His energy returned, and his tail never stopped wagging.
AboutUs.block-3-content-1: This personal journey sparked an idea: What if I could extend this increase in health and happiness to all dogs? Why should real food be an exception rather than the norm for our beloved pets?
AboutUs.block-4-content-1: That<apos14></apos14>s how OCELLE was born. Our philosophy is straightforward: Real, nourishing food isn<apos10></apos10>t a pet<apos14></apos14>s privilege; it<apos10></apos10>s their right. We believe in the connection between diet and well-being, mirroring the importance of food in all our lives. No one should have to rely on the same processed foods, day in, day out, all year round.
AboutUs.block-4-content-2: OCELLE isn<apos10></apos10>t just about providing dog food; we<apos14></apos14>re redefining what pet nutrition actually means, and how we can all apply it in our homes, with ease.
AboutUs.block-4-content-3: After extensive research into pet nutrition, with insights from leading Vet Nutritionists, we<apos04></apos04>ve developed a range of fresh, convenient pet food solutions, that are both innovative and ground-breaking!
AboutUs.block-4-content-4: Our recipes aren<apos14></apos14>t just human-grade in quality; they<apos14></apos14>re meticulously crafted to promote your Dog<apos10></apos10>s health and happiness, with the same love and care you<apos04></apos04>d put into creating a family meal.
AboutUs.block-4-content-5: Welcome to OCELLE, where your Dog<apos10></apos10>s well-being isn<apos10></apos10>t just our business—it<apos10></apos10>s our heartfelt commitment.
AboutUs.block-6-content-1: Are you as passionate as we are about giving your dog(s) the best? Were firm believers in the strength of community to bring about real transformation. If youre interested in helping us spread our mission to make a paws-itive impact on canine lives, apply here to become an OCELLE Affiliate.

Careers.block-1-content: Make a living helping dogs live happier, healthier lives.
Careers.block-2-content-1: While we don<apos04></apos04>t currently have any positions open, we<apos14></apos14>re always on the lookout for talented individuals who share our love for wagging tails and healthy dogs.
Careers.block-2-content-2: If you<apos14></apos14>re eager to make a difference, please send your resume to
Careers.block-2-content-3: . You never know, the paw-fect opportunity might just arise!
Careers.block-2-content-4: We look forward to hearing from you!
Careers.detail-content-1: OCELLE was born with the mission of improving the lives of pets and pet parents nationwide. We make human-grade pet food, tailored for each Dog<apos10></apos10>s nutritional needs, and deliver directly to our customers<apos04></apos04> doors. Through OCELLE<apos14></apos14>s carefully crafted meals and health services for members, dogs can truly live their healthiest, happiest lives.
Careers.detail-content-2: As a member of our growing team, you<apos04></apos04>ll take part in a company culture that cares deeply about its work and its team members. We move fast, value autonomy and ownership, and are always looking for new ideas.
Careers.detail-content-3: At OCELLE we know that people are the heart of the business, and we prioritise their welfare. OCELLE embraces diversity and equal opportunity. We<apos14></apos14>re committed to building a team that represents a variety of backgrounds, perspectives, and skills. OCELLE is an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate on the basis of race, national origin, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, disability, age, or other legally protected status. For individuals with disabilities who would like to request an accommodation, please include that in your application.

Newsletter.content-1: Exclusive insights, special offers, and helpful nutrition information from the OCELLE <block>Dog Pack.</block>

Subscription.block-1-subtitle: Nutrition is not a one-size-fits-all affair!
Subscription.block-1-content: Our unique, customised recipes are crafted by our Vet Nutritionist and tailored to your Dog<apos10></apos10>s health goals and ongoing needs.
Subscription.block-2-item-1-content: Complete our short quiz so we can get to know your dog! We<apos04></apos04>ll help build a uniquely crafted meal plan, just for them.
Subscription.block-2-item-2-content: Your starter box contains a two-week supply of freshly prepared meals, to let your dog do the all-important taste testing!
Subscription.block-2-item-3-content: Ultra-Convenience: Our meals are delivered direct to your door, fresh and bursting with flavour and nutrients.
Subscription.block-3-title:
Choose A Plan That Suits

Your Dog & You
Subscription.block-4-content: Choose from five protein-rich fresh recipes, meticulously crafted with whole foods, slow-cooked to enhance both nutrition and taste. Mix-and-match according to your dog’s needs. After all, you know your dog best of all!
Subscription.block-5-content: From puppy food to senior dog food – we<apos14></apos14>re with you every step of the way. Our meals evolve with your dog, delivering maximum benefits at every bowl.
Subscription.block-6-content-1-title: Get ready for some serious tail-wagging!
Subscription.block-6-content-1-content: Pop your fresh food in the freezer, then defrost in the fridge 24 hours before mealtime. Dinner is served!
Subscription.block-7-content-1-content: Easily tweak your delivery timings or choose new recipes based on what<apos14></apos14>s perfect for you and your dog.
